Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.F Office of the Director - Radest through Amster
Subseries IV.F Office of the Director - Radest through Amster

Materials created by and during the tenure of directors Howard Radest and Jeanne Amster during the 1980s and early 1990s. Many items were created by assistant director Ellen Edwards and business managers Joseph Estenes and Robert Dicker.
